short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make a note in TheBrain about something on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BrainBox captures the current web page so you can access it from TheBrain. Now you can save not just the URL and title but also the content from the page itself. Settings enable sending the information directly to a specific thought, adding a new thought or even appending to an existing note.
